content:
/>
II.i.1.B.4.a
.
Locating Source Materials
The source folder or shipment must be located before a rescan request can be submitted.  Perform a search using the file number and select the matching shipment to identify the DCS ID number and location of the RMN shipment.
Notes
:
If the RMN shipment location cannot be identified, copy the tracking number and enter it in the
UPS tracking website
.
The website provides meaningful information only if the tracking number is 120 days old or less.
References
:  For more information on
shipping manifests and DCSs, see the
VBMS Core User Guide
, and
submitting a rescan request, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 1.B.4.b
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Veterans Claims Intake Program (VCIP) Shipping
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
